nodes.documentation:
@dev
 1) Uses msg.sender to ask MatryxProxy for the type of library this call should be forwarded to
 2) Uses this library type to lookup (in its own storage) the name of the library
 3) Uses this name to ask MatryxProxy for the address of the contract (under this platform's version)
 4) Uses name and signature to ask MatryxProxy for the data necessary to modify the incoming calldata
    so as to be appropriate for the associated library call
 5) Makes a delegatecall to the library address given by MatryxProxy with the library-appropriate calldata

nodes.name: setContractTypeLibrary
getContractTypeLibrary
getTournaments
enterMatryx

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Round bounty cannot exceed Tournament bounty"

arguments.value: Round bounty cannot exceed Tournament bounty

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Round bounty cannot exceed Tournament bounty"

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address,address,struct MatryxPlatform.Info storage pointer,struct MatryxPlatform.Data storage pointer,struct LibRound.RoundDetails memory) returns (address)

nodes.name: createTournament
